Abstract.Para: Returns by indirection an array of all available compression types that can be used when writing a TIFF image.

Definition.Para: On return, a C array of NSTIFFCompression constants. This array belongs to the NSBitmapImageRep class; it shouldn’t be freed or altered. See “Constants” for the supported TIFF compression types.
The number of constants in list.

Discussion.Para: Note that not all compression types can be used for all images: NSTIFFCompressionNEXT can be used only to retrieve image data. Because future releases may include other compression types, always use this method to get the available compression types—for example, when you implement a user interface for selecting compression types.

Availability.AvailabilityItem: Available in OS X v10.0 and later.
